website_summaries.verdict: Great contemporary style mixed with high function in a single towel bar. Goes well with a variety of bathroom style decors.
pros: Simple fasteners are quick to screw into the wall for support and security
Holds towels without dropping them as you move around the bathroom
cons: The value pack of three is more expensive than other multi-bar sets

customer_reviews.title: So when I opened this I was so happy to see that it was actually in great condition ...
customer_reviews.text: when first moving into my apartment the original towel hanger broke so we have lived here for over 8 months now with a broken towel holder. I got very tired of not having one so i measured the old one and ordered a new one! this one was so cheap i was actually worried about the quality of the product but I thought, what could it hurt. So when I opened this I was so happy to see that it was actually in great condition and very sturdy for such a cheap product price wise. I am very happy with this purchase and im happy i took the chance on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alexxis Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Great towel bar for the price!
customer_reviews.text: It feels really sturdy and was easy to put up. I just needed something cheap because I currently live in a rental. I didn't want anything too fancy. This still looks pretty good and I have no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hanging in there...
customer_reviews.text: It's fine for my upstairs bathroom. I bought it for the main bathroom, but it was too long. I guess I should've measured my space first, but rather than returning it I decided to add a towel bar to the upstairs bathroom. It was super easy to install. I wish it would have had one of those paper guides though. The only other thing I'm not so fond about is that you can see the screw heads. I've had it up for about a week with 3 boys that use that bathroom, and so far it's still on the wall without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Tana Cox

customer_reviews.title: Can't disagree with the BEST VALUE claim
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected for something at this price. It doesn't look cheap, but it feels light and hollow. Then again, once installed, as long as it looks nice, who cares about its weight. Installation was very easy with a template provided. And once installed properly, it stays well in place.
customer_reviews.author: T. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected for a great price. I wanted to upgrade my bathroom shelf with a towel bar but didn't find any where the endpieces would be narrow enough to fit on the sides of my shelf. This one worked out perfectly. I cut the inner bar to the right length (not at all a problem with a handsaw suited for metal) and now have the perfect solution for my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: rueblig

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable.
customer_reviews.text: Bottom of the line towel rack. I needed one more place to hang towels and this was the closest match to the cheap contractor grade I currently have. I was not willing to pay more until I remodel the bathroom and get nicer ones. The mounting screws on this one show on both the top and bottom of the bracket. I would not get it again for that reason but, as a temporary measure it is sturdy enough for a bathtowel.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty good. Use a smaller drill than the instructions say to install.
customer_reviews.text: The rail was okay for the price paid. I bought two rails and we are happy with them. I used the next smallest drill size to drill the mounting holes and was glad I did. If I'd used the 1/4" drill recommended in the instruction the wall plugs looked like they would have caused problems.
customer_reviews.author: RichT

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: When I received this in the box - it looked a little cheap and I actually thought about returning it. But then I got lazy.... I ended up using it in the bathroom but it went along with the rest of the hardware so well, it looks fantastic and does not look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Tuba

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy To Install
customer_reviews.text: The Best Value 24" towel bar is easy to install! Thought it was all one piece when I ordered it, but it not! Comes in 3 different pieces - the two braces for wall mounting & the long bar that goes in the middle! Took about 5 minutes to install at most! The towel rake is made of light aluminum, but seem to hold weight well! Screws are NOT included - would recommend using drywall screw!
customer_reviews.author: WilliamTop Contributor: Country Music

customer_reviews.title: Great Rack!
customer_reviews.text: This towel bar is of the upmost quality. They must have found the aluminum and chromium in a sacred mine somewhere in the Swiss alps. The rigidity of the bar certainly offers the necessary support for your typical towl, but I might guess it could also support an Abrams tank long enough to repair the track after an explosive separation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, sturdy towel bar. It is not the most beautiful, nor designer, but it does the job and easy to install. The packaging is a screw template, so if you use that the bar does not rattle at all. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: keep it simple
customer_reviews.text: this is a nice simple addition to the bathroom, not a replacement. though it did not match exactly the original one, it is close enough. if you don't mind the exposed screws, this will be just fine for you.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl S.

customer_reviews.title: Very light, almost plastic feeling. But gets job done.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. I use this in my master bath. If you're in a rental apartment for a relatively short term, like me, this will do the job. It's light and plastic-feeling. It was easy to install. Look elsewhere for a heftier and higher-quality tower bar if you're thinking of installing it in your permanent home.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Strong.
customer_reviews.text: Needed an additional towel rack in apartment bathroom. It’s perfect. It’s actually stronger than I expected. Very pleased with the finish. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Robert P. Stenger

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it works perfect for what I needed. I did cut it down because I bought the one that's too long.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Great rack easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and looks very nice in my bathroom! I could not find my tape measure but the packaging it comes with conveniently had an illustration of the bar which I used as a guide to help me drill holes into the wall,and place in bathroom. Great product, would recommend and buy again. Be advised, you will probably need a drill to properly install in your bathroom, would not recommend trying without one.
customer_reviews.author: Haze Corps

customer_reviews.title: Looks fine for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love it based on the look and price I paid. This is not your high end towel bar racks, but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: mchinca

customer_reviews.title: Good, be careful of mounting template
customer_reviews.text: It works and looks fine, and was easy to install. However, I removed a star because the mounting template supplied is printed on the cardboard crooked, when you use it you have to make sure to level the DIAGRAM on the template, not the cardboard itself; if I hadn't noticed that it would have been super off-level on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Bushman

customer_reviews.title: Very plain looking but it's sturdy and does a great job
customer_reviews.text: Very plain looking but it's sturdy and does a great job. The bar is thick so a damp towel actually gets completely dry hanging on it. I plan to replace all towel and hanging hardware in my bathroom but I haven't decided on the style yet, so this is working great for me for now. Can't beat the price either.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Holds a towel....just like a $40 designer bar does.
customer_reviews.text: Everybody has seen this style of cheap towel bar before. I was not surprised either way with them. The success is highly determined by how well you anchor it to the wall. (Why don't they make them in 32" for standard stud spacing? Probably because people care more about the aesthetics of placement than strength). However, I have found you can find these at local home improvement stores in the $6-$8 range. Sometimes it's cheaper to buy a 2-pack of replacement ends and a replacement bar than to buy the whole thing together.
customer_reviews.author: ticketmagnet

customer_reviews.title: great towel bar for a rental
customer_reviews.text: you can see the screws that hold this bar in. it provides a much more secure connection then the little brackets most towel bar clip on to. I use it in all my rentals as they hold up the best to abuse.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Wide enough, easy to install and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This towel bar is amazing!! Easy to install and wide enough to hang your towel. I recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Student Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy place to store wash rags to dry in order to prevent bacteria and mildew buildup by leaving them wet in the shower.
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. I didn't need to add anything else to my already too small bathroom, however, this was a must have bc I've increasingly noticed after leaving wash rags in the shower the smell of mildew develops quickly and there is no way I can use a rag that smells like it is decaying.
customer_reviews.author: Jo'Nessa-Li'

customer_reviews.title: Works for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my bathroom to put inside my shower to hang my bath mat on. So far it holds up well, looks great, and seems like it will last for quite awhile. No rust problems, and it's been holding my bath mat which is much heavier than a bath towel. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Basic Towel Rack
customer_reviews.text: Small wiggle in the bar once installed (tiny gap between mounts and the connecting rod)
customer_reviews.author: Braden Bartnik

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation, seem to be made of strong material
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation, seem to be made of strong material, and has a bit of a modern look to it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Arvind Ramoutar

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Nothing spectacular but like always you get what you pay for so adequate for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Erwin

customer_reviews.title: Will do the trick
customer_reviews.text: The towel racks in my crappy apartment broke and we needed a replacement that was inexpensive since I don't plan on taking them when I move.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Wickens

customer_reviews.title: Ships fast, extended towel bar
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. This towel bar is longer than the average so make sure to measure your space before ordering. It works great in my space. Delivery was very quick with Prime!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well
customer_reviews.text: It's Easy to put up and holds the towel alright. Does the job. Gave 4 stars due to the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Towel Rack
customer_reviews.text: This was a life safer. My only complaint is that is very light weight and I though the bar would be a little bigger, its thin. Other than that, the length and everything else was perfect. It is easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: remie

customer_reviews.title: Good and strong
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the strongest designs for a bath towel bar, If you screw It into studs it won’t be coming down
customer_reviews.author: 97guns

customer_reviews.title: Good For the Proce
customer_reviews.text: Clean towel rack that does the job. Quality felt cheap upon seeing packaging but installed with wall anchors and it was very sturdy. Color was as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Hammac

customer_reviews.title: Great! But pricier ones are better
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little piece of hardware. Easy to install, looks good. Holds up well. Not much else to say besides it's super cheap! You do get what you pay for though. Those $20 ones will be nicer, but this works just fine for a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good based on its price
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended I wish this bat was more sturdy but good for the price
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Great for an apt. bath
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, but perfect for an apt. that isn't yours if you want to change the look without wasting your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jourdan Calderon

customer_reviews.title: Easy install.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. It came with a template on the back of the packaging. It looks great too! Very glad I went with the 30 inch bar. It is very strudy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Naffrey

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, simple design.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a simple towel bar for my rental apartment. This one has a nice price and is pretty sturdy. Comes with hardware to hang it, even a nice mall that dictates where to drill the holes.
customer_reviews.author: sabvd

customer_reviews.title: It's a Bar
customer_reviews.text: The most bar-like towel restiesty towel placement system you can ever imagine. Your towels shall feel like gods when placed upon this bar.
customer_reviews.author: Tayhlia

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, didn't take long to install, and holds ma hand towels in the bathroom! Plus you can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Woodby

customer_reviews.title: FLIMSY! Bar falls off continually!
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy - bar keeps falling off. Plan to return :(
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Parker

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Had to return due to me ordering the wrong size.
customer_reviews.author: Talbert

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS. Plain and simple.
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted a simple towel bar but these days they cost a small fortune! This works perfectly for about $10. I spray painted it to match my decor and viola!
customer_reviews.author: Boo

customer_reviews.title: Great towel bar!
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, easy to install with included template, looks nice, contemporary.
customer_reviews.author: vwpilot

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Simple, cheap, easy to install, comes with all the parts and just the right dimensions to fit on the wall right behind my bathroom door
customer_reviews.author: F. Huang

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: It's a towel rack. What else is there to say?
customer_reviews.author: Jason S.

customer_reviews.title: I give this towel bar rack a high rating for quality.
customer_reviews.text: everything fits perfect and it adds good decor to my bath area.
customer_reviews.author: chat

customer_reviews.title: it was exactly like the towel rack I wanted to replace
customer_reviews.text: it was exactly like the one I had to replace that was the original from the Parkside built in 2004. I did not want ot make any new nail holes so I just swabbed out the new towel rack. It arrived on date as stated when ordered and in excellent condition
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: As described, too small for two full size towels
customer_reviews.text: Works well however does not fit two full size towels on it well so I would go bigger if that is what you are looking for
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdier than I've expected and soooo easy to install
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdier than I've expected and soooo easy to install. The guidance on the package is a huge help to make a mark where the hole needed to be. Can't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: MaSBoY

customer_reviews.title: Great even for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our bathrooms and sturdy! Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does the job..
customer_reviews.text: Well, it’s a towel bar, so.. it’s straight, easy to hang, comes will all required materials, and it holds my towel well. All and all, I think I got a winner with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M

customer_reviews.title: Bar rattles in sockets
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheap towel rack and you get what you pay for, the bar rattles around in the sockets which is somewhat annoying but not that big of deal.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Bracken

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and does the job
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is... a towel rack. Easy to install and does the job. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Add more stuffing!
customer_reviews.text: I could tell that the product would've been great quality for what it was designed for, but it apparently wasn't suitable to the shipping process. It's usable, but not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, but solid and secure enough for the intended ...
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, but solid and secure enough for the intended purpose, and for the price I would definitely buy it again if needed. The total length once assembled is 25" (in case you need to fit it in a constrained space).
customer_reviews.author: Olibclarke

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Looked all over town for one of these and could find one under $40. This was less and more durable in addition to being easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: sheena

customer_reviews.title: Towel rack
customer_reviews.text: I bought these along with the towel rings. I looked at other stores and they were priced too high. Amazon gave me exactly what I wanted and at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Corder

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Holds my towels well, now I can fire the butler.
customer_reviews.author: Just shopping

customer_reviews.title: straightforward and good value for price
customer_reviews.text: Simple, straightforward and good value for price. Just keep in mind, that you are getting a very light hallow rod, nothing fancy. I had the same exact one that bent, after knocking over it. Not meant to withstand a lot of pressure - not that I expect to put pressure over on it or anything. But for the money it is -- I don't mind buying it at all. Buy if you are looking for a no fancy, no frill rod.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Finn

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do and looks great. It was very easy and quick to install.
customer_reviews.author: Walt Whitman

customer_reviews.title: It looks like it might be a bit flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Simple and cheap. It looks like it might be a bit flimsy. If you're about to slip and fall in the bathroom don't grab this to save you. But it will probably hold towels alright, even if they are damp.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Norman

customer_reviews.title: Affordable but not cheap looking.
customer_reviews.text: Affordable and perfect replace,ent for a similar looking one I broke in my apartment bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: K Baker

customer_reviews.title: Eay to install, if you have 3 hands. lol
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my bathroom, to hang my face cloths.
customer_reviews.author: BlackGoldMustang

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to have a second towel bar in our bathroom, and it looks nice, installed easily, and pretty closely matches the other one in that bathroom. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Chicago family

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Again same item as in local stores but here saved me money
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing
customer_reviews.text: These have truly helped organize my entire home by installing them on the back of closet doors for gloves, hats, scarves, towels, and jewelry. The only negative about this product is that it could be much heavier duty. For the price, it is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Fits well.
customer_reviews.text: I got this kit because I had broken my towel bar. It fits perfectly! I am so greatful.
customer_reviews.author: Howard L. Pearce

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap; in price and quality. I needed something fast and it served it's purpose
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this works great. For some reason I wasn't expecting mounting hardware but everything you need is in here. Perfect kit for a quick replacement!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's great. The screws are visible when it's mounted so it's not the prettiest towel bar, but after 2 month of daily use it's holding up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: ShereKhan0074

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price. I put it up in my bathroom and so far it seems good.
customer_reviews.author: S. Leinweber

customer_reviews.title: Nice inexpensive rack
customer_reviews.text: Like the that was in my house when I moved in. Good to well rack. Strong. Easy to put up.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT E HOLMES

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: These towel racks are great and use them for my kids in the room and in our bathrooms and they worked out wonderful
customer_reviews.author: P. Velez

customer_reviews.title: Decent towel rack.
customer_reviews.text: Decent bar, but not solid metal. Good for most families but beware of little kids pulling on it, as the bar sits in the side holders and don't actually lock in. I'm not disappointed though.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect towel bar to install in my bathroom and very easy to install as well!
customer_reviews.author: Dearnatural62

customer_reviews.title: I order this product it was easy to put on and I have no complaints about ...
customer_reviews.text: I order this product it was easy to put on and I have no complaints about this item when I am able to put more than four hand towels on him and not worry about it breaking
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie E. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, it really changed the way my bathroom looks
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, it really changed the way my bathroom looks. I'll be getting the other pieces. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: janacoyote

customer_reviews.title: They are sturdy and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace the old tarnished bars we had in the bathroom. They are sturdy and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya A Howard

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and feels stable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and feels stable. Not much to complain about. Some people might not like being able to see the screws, but I'd rather that than have a flimsy towel bar.
customer_reviews.author: El Diablo Robotico

customer_reviews.title: Installed a few weeks ago and it's holding up well ...
customer_reviews.text: Installed a few weeks ago and it's holding up well. The bar fits a little loose - suggest using tape at the very ends to keep it from rattling. The rattling isn't a big deal though, and you have to try rattling the bar for it to be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Young

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, just don't know if they belong in a nice house.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hang, just as I expected it to be.

customer_reviews.title: Execellent.
customer_reviews.text: Went up just fine. I sized it to fit exactly where I needed it.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy towel bar and it looks very nice. It's wide enough for a bath towel and a washcloth or hand towel. The inside usable space is 29".

customer_reviews.title: Great towel bar
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect size for my small bathroom. Looks great and was easy to install-great directions included.

customer_reviews.text: Not as good quality as expected but still works fine for what I needed it for.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly solid when installed properly, great value
customer_reviews.text: Its cheap, but works well. When mounted with the anchors they are surprisingly sturdy. I put them in my spare basement bathroom and was impressed with the results.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy and holds our huge bath sheet no problem. You can't beat the value.

customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. A lot lighter and thinner than I thought for the price. All in all it was ok to hang a towel on.

customer_reviews.title: and looks pretty good when installed
customer_reviews.text: It is made of actual metal, not metallicized plastic, and looks pretty good when installed. Cannot fault.

customer_reviews.text: Perfect to fix the broken one that I broke in my apartment

customer_reviews.text: True to dimensions listed online! Easy to install and durable! Will remember this if I ever need to buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Installed easily and works well. Have had this for a long time with no problems.

product_meta.title: Best Value D8518 Centura 18" Towel Bar Rack, Polish Chrome
product_meta.description:
Color:Polish Chrome| Size:18 Inch Towel BarInspired by the heart of classic Americana, the Centura collection combines casual style and exceptional value. Refined without fuss, this bath accessory collection offers subtle design that always looks clean and relaxed.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Centura 18 Towel Bar.
feature_bullets: Centura, a budget friendly Best Value collection, with subtle and relaxed design, will be an easy bath hardware option with coordinating 18", 24" and 30" towel bar, robe hook, towel ring, toilet paper holder, and toothbrush and tumbler holder options
The Centura collection offers simplistic design and polished chrome finish that is the perfect addition to any home décor
This 18" towel bar brings order and style to the bathroom in a sleek polished chrome finish
Set screw mount for simple installation; hardware included
Manufactured of zinc die cast for quality and durability

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars450 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
